name: Vermintoide: Pripyat (.20)
description:
A roguelike I made for the Disc Room Jam. In this game, you control a man in his radiation suit sent to purify an area filled with monsters. Good luck. You will need it.

Controls: 

  • WASD or ARROWS to move.
  • Left mouse button to attack.
  • Right mouse button to roll.
  • ESC to pause.

(Music not included in this build. )
